overview: Amanda Trask was taken by a man named Richard Alan Goetz and his family in 2001. She has lived on his family property, nicknamed "The Garden," ever since. In that time, she's learned to abide by his ways and live by his rules. In all that time, she's never tried to escape. Not even once. But when Amanda becomes pregnant with Richard's baby, she starts to wonder if maybe it isn't time to leave the nest of The Garden.
title: Gardener
